documentType: prison count sheet and inmate roster
summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 3, 2019. It includes official out-count forms, inmate rosters by assignment category (e.g., hospital, food service, attorney visit), and count slips for various housing units. The documents record the inmate population count and specific inmate assignments and locations within the facility on that date.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate population counts and out-counts were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, on August 3, 2019. The documents record the location and assignment of inmates across various housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 3, 2019, with register number 76318-054 and was housed in unit Z04-206LAD.
The document shows Epstein was listed on a roster for an attorney visit (ATTY category) on that date.
The total inmate population count recorded across the facility's housing units was 761 inmates.
Several other inmates are listed with 'SUICIDE OR' notations next to their names (Duncan, Mersey, McDuffie), indicating possible suicide watch status.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative records for tracking inmate location and population, created the day before Epstein's death.
